statusline.format: \x1b[1;36m$(basename "$PWD")\x1b[0m \x1b[90m│\x1b[0m \x1b[32m$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)\x1b[0m $(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | awk '{if($1>0) print "\x1b[33m"$1"\x1b[0m"; else print "\x1b[32m✓\x1b[0m"}') \x1b[90m│\x1b[0m $(date +%H:%M) \x1b[90m│\x1b[0m \x1b[90m$(uptime | awk -F'load average:' '{print $2}' | awk '{print $1}' | tr -d ',')\x1b[0m
